 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָעַל‎</span> **verb** ==bar, bolt, lock== (Late Hebrew ***id.***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָעַל‎</span> [[2Sam.13.18|2Sam 13:18]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָעָ֑ל‎</span> [[Judg.3.23|Judg 3:23]] ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְעֹל‎</span> [[2Sam.13.17|2Sam 13:17]] ***Passive participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָעוּל‎</span> [[Song.4.12|Song 4:12]] (twice in verse); feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְעֻלוֺת‎</span> [[Judg.3.24|Judg 3:24]] — ***bar, bolt, lock***, usually with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דֶּלֶת‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׃דְּלָתוֺת‎</span> [[Judg.3.23|Judg 3:23]], + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַחֲרֵי‎</span> ***after, behind***, v[[Judg.3.24|Judg 3:24]]; [[2Sam.13.17|2Sam 13:17]]; [[2Sam.13.18|2Sam 13:18]] elsewhere only <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גַּן נָעוּל‎</span> [[Song.4.12|Song 4:12]] ***a garden barred*** (figurative of Shulamite), so also v[[Song.4.12|Song 4:12]] b (reading <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גַּן‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גַּל‎</span>, [[BDB#Vrss|Vrss]] [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]]). 



 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָעַל‎</span>] **verb denominative** ==furnish with sandals, shoe== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְעַל‎</span> (rare), ***bind on sandal***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***furnish with sandals, shoe*** horse or camel; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***shoe*** horse); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 1 singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וָאֶנְעֲלֵךְ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּ֑חַשׁ‎</span> [[Ezek.16.10|Ezek 16:10]] ***and I shod thee with*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תחשׁ‎</span> (q. v.). **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּנְעִלוּם‎</span> [[2Chr.28.15|2Chr 28:15]] ***and gave them sandals***.
